All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvanceHttpListener
public class HttpDataStoreListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvanceHttpListener

Utility class to parse and compose DataStore request coming as XML format and delegate it properly to an AdvanceDataStore object.

Author:
akarnokd, 2011.09.27.
